meanings.sent1: She refilters the coffee to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: He always refilters the water before drinking it.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally refilters the soup twice, making it too concentrated.
meanings.sent4: The student refilters the information in his mind to understand it better.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic refilters the oil to ensure it is clean for the engine.

meanings.sent1: After cleaning the fish tank, she refilters the water to keep it clear.
meanings.sent2: He refilters the air in the room to remove any remaining dust particles.
meanings.sent3: The scientist refilters the sample to confirm the results of the experiment.
meanings.sent4: The farmer refilters the irrigation water to prevent clogging in the pipes.
meanings.sent5: The barista refilters the coffee to enhance its flavor before serving.
